game.name: The Gardener
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In this puzzle game you explore a grand garden, discover exotic flora and uncover their rules to solve tile-based lawn mowing puzzles. You play as Hectare who receives a mysterious letter from the missing owner of this garden asking you to tend to the lawns. Solve puzzles and uncover the mystery!
game.shortDescriptionEn: In this puzzle game you explore a grand garden, discover exotic flora and uncover their rules to solve tile-based lawn mowing puzzles. You play as Hectare who receives a mysterious letter from the missing owner of this garden asking you to tend to the lawns. Solve puzzles and uncover the mystery!
